price: 24. En voorwaar zij hebben velen doen afdwalen. En: “Laat de onrechtvaardigen alleen maar meer dwalen.”
arabic: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّواْ كَثِيرٗاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَٰلٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waqad aḍallū kathīran walā tazidi al-ẓālimīna illā ḍalālan
